text: Darren S. Aronofsky (born February 12, 1969 in Brooklyn, New York) is an American movie director. His best known movies that he has directed are Requiem for a Dream, The Wrestler and Black Swan. He attended Harvard University where he graduated in 1991 and majored in social anthropology. He is has Polish ancestry. He was raised culturally Jewish. == Movies by Darren Aronofsky == * Pi (1998) * Requiem for a Dream (2000) * Below (2002) * The Fountain (2006) * The Wrestler (2008) * Black Swan (2010) * Noah (2014) * Mother! (2017) ==References== == Other websites == *Darren Aronofsky's Official website Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:Entertainers from New York City Category:American Jews Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Darren Aronofsky
